meanings.definition: A type of tire construction in which the cords run diagonally across the tire.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic recommended using crossply tires for better traction.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the crossply of the tire as I drove over the bumpy road.
meanings.sent3: The crossply tires decided to race each other around the track.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the crossply of a well-made tire.
meanings.sent5: The crossply design of the tire made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: To arrange or intersect in a crosswise manner.
meanings.sent1: She had to crossply the boards to create a sturdy base for the shed.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to crossply the colors to create a unique pattern.
meanings.sent3: He crossplied the wires in a way that even confused the electrician.
meanings.sent4: The paths of fate crossply in mysterious ways.
meanings.sent5: Crossplying the threads carefully ensured a strong and durable fabric.
